## Elbridge Gerry

![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9d/Elbridge-gerry-painting.jpg/440px-Elbridge-gerry-painting.jpg)

- Born in Marblehead, MA!

- Gerrymandering is named after him, but his name is pronounced with a hard "g"

Political positions:

1. Member of U.S. House of Representatives (1789-1793)
2. Ninth governor of Massachusetts (1810-1812)
3. Fifth vice president of U.S. (1813-1814, died in office)

More information is available on  [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elbridge_Gerry)
